pgrid.network.protocol
Class PGridCompressedMessage

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.network.protocol.PGridCompressedMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Message, PGridMessage
public class PGridCompressedMessage
extends Object
implements PGridMessage

This class represent a partially readen message where the header has been decoded but the message is still compressed in a byte array.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Renault John
